ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.rendered
Interface TileStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
TileGrid, TileMap
public interface TileStore

This the generic interface for a TileStore. This is used to store and retrieve tiles from the cache.

Version:
$Id: TileStore.java 498740 2007-01-22 18:35:57Z dvholten $
